name: My name is Edward
description: Through "My name is Edward", live for a few moments in the shoes of a Schizophrenic. Dr. Williams have to diagnose Edward's mental state in order to judge if he should be chained or not. For that purpose, he will relive elements that have been decisive in his decline to Schizophrenia. The player will have to to succeed the differents game, to avoid Edward's bad memories.
